1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit, Coffin Nails Long Fake Nails Tips For Nail Salons And DIY Nail, Artificial Half Cover Nail Tips With Box, Nature & Clear, 10 Size
VEAFX
{'Color': 'Clear', 'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'VEAFX', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 7 x 1.4 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '782912939134'}
Lots of nails to work with. They aren’t as thick as I’d like them to be. They’re more on the thin, flimsy plastic side. They do stay in place once applied. Overall, they’re good for what they’re for. I like that you get the regular coke and a clear set as well. Great starter kit.
1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
PRETTY FRANK
{'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I really love this deodorant. It doesn’t contain aluminum. As it states, a little goes a long way. I work in Nursing so my workload is very heavy and I sweat a lot. I’m still smelling fresh when using this. It’s easy to apply. Just grab a pinch, rub it between two fingers and apply. You don’t need to use a lot. It has a nice consistency. Not sticky. Not too think or too thick. Doesn’t stain hands or clothing. I wish the scent was a bit stronger but I still love it overall.
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant
Toyotress Tiana Passion Braid Hair - 18 inch 8 Packs Ombre Blonde Wavy Box Braids Crochet Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (18 Inch, T27)

It’s faulty soft and lightweight. Easy to install. It’s quality hair. I just don’t like the look of it. The braids are a little too big for my liking right now. The color is pretty. Not as bright as the pic. I like the length. Not too short. Not too long. Overall, I like the hair.

profile:
The user showcases a strong preference for beauty and personal care products that blend quality, convenience, and aesthetics. They prioritize high-quality hair care items that are lightweight and manageable for long wear, recently exploring budget-friendly hair products that offer styling versatility without compromising visual appeal. Their latest engagement with wigs reflects their commitment to finding items that enhance their beauty routine while maintaining a fresh aesthetic.

The user values practical beauty tools, emphasizing functionality alongside style, which is evident in their interest in versatile products like nail kits. Their focus remains on acquiring options that provide ease of use while ensuring aesthetic satisfaction. While they have noted occasional issues like shedding and tangling, they continue to seek easy-to-manage solutions that contribute to an effortless beauty experience.

Recent interactions suggest an appreciation for high-quality materials and innovative features, such as glueless designs and soft textures, which align with their overall approach to beauty. Their reviews and purchases indicate a balanced pursuit of quality versus budget, reinforcing their quest for items that offer both value and visual appeal. Overall, the user is dedicated to cultivating a curated collection of beauty products that resonate with their lifestyle and personal style preferences, ensuring they embody both practicality and elegance in their beauty routine.
